duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine diagnostic checks, isolate, and repair problems in automated rod pump control systems.
Coordinate maintenance activities with operations daily, and manage ticketing process for each job completed.
Lead automation failure analysis and recommendations going forward.
Utilize all necessary safe work practices when performing automation work.
Frequent communication with the operation team, Scada/IT group, measurement, and engineering.

education_certification.credential: High School/Secondary education required, Apprentice or Journeymen electrical certification preferred.
